QuestData.Title: They Made Their Choice
QuestData.Description:
It wasn't enough for Azshara to break the world. She had to doom the rest of our people here as well!
Those who didn't choose to become naga were stuck in this horrifying half death, left to haunt these drowned ruins.
I am almost afraid of what we will find if we do find my friend.
Wait, did you hear something?
